message:
UPDATE AVAILABLE

Click here

Oct. 19, 2025:

Top priority this week: Get your hands dirty - get customers to show you what they do with their APIs.

Look at the way we have Postman set up internally and use it as a guide.

Internalize The How to Use Postman guides.
tool_update:
Foundation Scores (Looker) and performance improvements now available.

Roadmap:

  • Automatic cursor CLI setup (automated brief generation by next week?)
  • Automated analysis
  • Linkedin Integration
  • Public News integration
